display_long_description:
Your personal trainer, right in your living room.
Best-of-class quality, filled with fun content, and the best price you’ll find.

Feel the joy of a healthier you - starting today.

**GET FIT WHILE HAVING FUN**

Do you love action-packed rhythm games that get you moving without even realizing you're working out? Feel healthier and fitter instantly – this is for you!

[media]

**MOTIVATION REDEFINED**

Work out with an AI coach so lifelike, it feels like a real friend cheering you on. Choose super star trainers like fitness star Daisy Keech, TikTok icon Enola Bedard, Kida the Great, or Josh Killacky – or create your own with over 800 customization options, all in top-tier quality. This is xFIT!

**LOADED WITH CONTENT & FEATURES**

xFIT is our most advanced, feature-packed fitness app yet – with breathtaking Unreal Engine 5 environments that set a new standard for visual excellence in fitness games - or you can turn your living room into a fun, interactive workout zone in 
**Mixed Reality!**

[media]

**SOCIAL PLATFORM**

Stay connected and motivated with real-time multiplayer modes, live leaderboards, replay video editors and more. Fitness is better together!


**FITTER THAN EVER**

More than rhythmic action — xFIT offers 64 challenges, 8 pro-level programs, and wellness routines for recovery, posture, and flexibility. Track your progress with detailed dashboards and enjoy a full-body workout that keeps you feeling great.

[media]

Unlike other apps: one price, all access, no subscriptions!

Feel the joy of a healthier you - starting today.
